name: Jraml
tagline: raml, java, jraml, rest, api, jaxrs
body:
# Purpose of project
Jraml helps you build your java implementation of REST API, based on specification, described by raml file.

# Easy to use
1. Connect a library
2. Add listener to your servlet container configuration
3. Annotate your resources with **@RAMLConfig** annotation

## Useful links
[RAML](http://raml.org/)
